page.title: 15A SELBY BOY'S SPARE TIME
page.content:
In my spare time I usually{play}with a friend. We sometimes play at his house and sometimes we play in the park. When we go to the{park}we sometimes play cricket, but other times we just play on the swings. If my friend is on holiday I play football against the wall, but other times I play games with my sisters or watch{T.V.}When it is hot outside I just play with the rabbit, but on very hot days I just lie down and stare at the sky. When it has{snowed}in the winter I play on my {sledge}with my friend, but when I'm on my own I make{snowmen}and throw {snowballs}against the wall. Also I {watch birds,}especially in the nesting season, and I make dens to watch the birds from.
{Michael Silversides {
